values.value:
Overview


(a)I understand that Greenheart Exchange is my visa sponsor for the J-1 Teacher exchange visitor program, I accept all decisions made by Greenheart Exchange regarding all aspects of my visa sponsorship.

(b) As an Exchange Visitor sponsored by Greenheart Exchange, I understand that it is my responsibility to be aware of and abide by all the rules and regulations associated with this program (22 CFR part 62); https://greenheartexchange.org/professional-exchange/teach-in-a-u-s-school/#/tab/regulation).

(c)I understand that the J-1 Teacher program must not displace United States (U.S.). employees and/or be a conduit to permanent work and residency in the U.S.

(d) I am responsible for completing and adhering to all the information presented in the mandatory Participant Virtual Orientation, which I must complete before I travel to the U.S.

(e) I will be respectful of all people regardless of their race, religion, nationality, culture, gender, or sexual orientation.

(f) Greenheart Exchange reserves the right to terminate my visa sponsorship if I am found to have misrepresented myself or provided false information in the program application or otherwise.

(g) If I bring J-2 dependents on my program, my J-2 dependents and I will abide by all program and Greenheart Exchange regulations and rules.

(h) If my program is shortened for any reason, I will not receive a refund for my program fees.
